Home.head-text:
Hi, I am Zhanda,

A web developer from KZðŸ‡°ðŸ‡¿
Home.about-me: I create efficient web solutions and take on both frontend and backend projects separately or as a full-stack. Ready to collaborate on new and exciting ideas!

Contacts.paragraph1: Write to me by <emailTag>e-mail</emailTag> or fill out the form below and tell me about your task.
Contacts.paragraph2: I'll contact you as soon as possible, answer your questions and offer a solution.

validation.messageMinLength: Message must be at least 10 characters

placeholders.name: Your name
placeholders.textarea: More detailed description of your task or question

WebForm.success: Your message has been successfully sent!
WebForm.failed: It seems the form is not working, please try to contact me through other channels. You can find a list of contacts in the website footer.

MainPageMetadata.title: Zhanda.dev Blog Portfolio
MainPageMetadata.description: Welcome to the Blog Portfolio of Zhanda, a web developer from Kazakhstan. You can explore my work and hire me for your project.

BlogSectionMetadata.title: 'Blog' Section of Zhanda.dev
BlogSectionMetadata.description: The blog of Zhanda, a web developer from Kazakhstan, where I share my experience in web development, talk about projects, technologies, and interesting events from life.

WorksSectionMetadata.title: Examples of Completed Works
WorksSectionMetadata.description: A section featuring examples of web development projects I've completed, including the creation of websites and web applications using modern technologies like React and Next.js.

ContactsSectionMetadata.title: Contact Form for Collaboration
ContactsSectionMetadata.description: A page to get in touch with Zhanda, a web developer from Kazakhstan. Fill out the form to discuss your project, ask questions, or start a collaboration.
